markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Common Backgrounds](/Rules.aspx?ID=1428)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 48 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The following common backgrounds supplement those found in the Core Rulebook and are available to any character during character creation. Some of these backgrounds grant skill feats from Chapter 4 of this book.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Common Backgrounds
